block.p: Karen Elizabeth Keegan, a daughter of Mary Jane and Gerard Keegan of Garden City, N.Y., was married yesterday to John Joseph Durham, a son of Susan and John H. Durham of Madison, Conn. The Rev. Joseph Schlaffer, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at St. Joseph's Church in Garden City, N.Y.
The couple, both 24, graduated from the College of the Holy Cross.

Karen Elizabeth Keegan, a daughter of Mary Jane and Gerard Keegan of Garden City, N.Y., was married yesterday to John Joseph Durham, a son of Susan and John H. Durham of Madison, Conn. The Rev. Joseph Schlaffer, a Roman Catholic priest, performed the ceremony at St. Joseph's Church in Garden City, N.Y.
The couple, both 24, graduated from the College of the Holy Cross.

Mrs. Durham was until this month a sales associate in the private banking services division at J. P. Morgan & Company in New York. Her father is a vice chairman and the chief administrative officer of the Astoria Financial Corporation, a savings bank in Lake Success, N.Y. Her mother retired as an administrator for the Technological School of Nassau County in Westbury, N.Y.

Mr. Durham is a third-year law student at the University of Connecticut. His mother is a reading assistant for the third grade at the Island Avenue Elementary School in Madison. His father is the counsel to the United States attorney in New Haven and a special investigative attorney in Boston for Attorney General Janet Reno.
